sections.title: I Know That My Redeemer Lives
sections.author: Scott Soper
sections.snippet: I know that my Redeemer lives, the One who calls me home. I long to see God face to face, to see with my own eyes.

sections.title: Psalm 23: 1-3, 3-4, 5, 6
sections.author: Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: The Lord is my shepherd; there is nothing I shall want. The Lord is my shepherd; there is nothing I shall want.

sections.author: Matthew 25:34 (668.1)
sections.snippet: Come, you who are blessed by my Father; inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world.
sections.title: Gospel Acclamation
Keep Me in Your Heart
sections.author: Janèt Sullivan Whitaker
sections.snippet: Jesus, hold me in peace; keep me in your heart.  Let me know your mercy; keep me in your heart.  Jesus, you are my hope. Help me when the darkness comes. In your kindness, keep me in your heart.

sections.author: John W. Thompson, Randy Scruggs
sections.snippet: Lord, prepare me to be a sanctuary; pure and holy; tried and true. With thanksgiving; I'll be a living Sanctuary for You.
sections.title: Sanctuary
I Am the Bread of Life
sections.author: Steve Angrisano/Tom Booth
sections.snippet: I am the Bread of Life, I am the hope in night, I am the door wide open, I am the shepherd’s might, I am the truth and light, I am the way and life, I Am Who Am and I am for you: Come and follow me.

sections.title: I, the Lord
sections.author: Tom Kendzia
sections.snippet: I, the Lord, am with you, always by your side. Come and take my hand, for I will lead you home. Follow me, follow me. Follow me, follow me.

sections.title: Go Out, Go Out
sections.author: Curtis Stephan
sections.snippet: Go out, go out to all the world and tell the Good News. Tell the Good... Good News!

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Lord have mercy! Christ have mercy! Lord have mercy!

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Glory to God! Glory to God in the highest, and on earth, peace to people of goodwill.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Holy, holy, holy Lord God of hosts. Heaven and earth are full of your glory. Hosanna in the highest. Blessed is he who comes in the moment of the Lord. Hosanna in the highest.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: When we eat this breadand drink this cup, we proclaim your death, O Lord, until you come again.

sections.author: Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
Mass of St. Mary Magdalene - Sarah Hart
sections.snippet: Lamb of God, You take away the sins of the world; have mercy, have mercy on us.
